abstract: The president of UBS’s investment bank who helped turn the Swiss bank into a mergers and acquisitions giant, is said to be leaving the firm.
snippet: The president of UBS’s investment bank who helped turn the Swiss bank into a mergers and acquisitions giant, is said to be leaving the firm.
lead_paragraph: Kenneth D. Moelis, the president of UBS’s investment bank who helped turn the Swiss bank into a mergers and acquisitions giant, will leave the firm, according to people briefed on the matter.

byline.original: By Andrew Ross Sorkin and Michael J. de la Merced

abstract: After an avalanche of reports surfaced that Kenneth D. Moelis, the president of UBS‘s investment bank, was considering ditching the firm following a series of run-ins with the Swiss bank’s management over private equity deals, The New York Times reports that Mr. Moelis, who helped turn the Swiss bank into a mergers and acquisitions giant, is indeed leaving.
lead_paragraph: After an avalanche of reports surfaced that Kenneth D. Moelis, the president of UBS‘s investment bank, was considering ditching the firm following a series of run-ins with the Swiss bank’s management over private equity deals, The New York Times reports that Mr. Moelis, who helped turn the Swiss bank into a mergers and acquisitions giant, is indeed leaving.

headline.main: UBS to Lose President of Investment Bank

abstract: It’s official: Kenneth D. Moelis, the president of UBS‘ investment bank, is leaving. DealBook obtained a copy of an internal memo by Huw Jenkins, the chairman and chief executive of UBS’ investment bank, and Peter A. Wuffli, the president of the firm’s Group Executive Board, announcing the veteran investment banker’s departure.
lead_paragraph: It’s official: Kenneth D. Moelis, the president of UBS‘ investment bank, is leaving. DealBook obtained a copy of an internal memo by Huw Jenkins, the chairman and chief executive of UBS’ investment bank, and Peter A. Wuffli, the president of the firm’s Group Executive Board, announcing the veteran investment banker’s departure.

headline.main: Moelis Is Leaving UBS: The Memo
